DESCRIPTION:
Test that a user with admin role can login to the content management platform 
using the same credentials as for the mobile app.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
NAME: test_NAF_7_2_0_Login_As_Admin

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can upload a new video to the platform with unpublished status.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Verify video is uploaded with unpublished status
6. Verify video appears in the videos list
NAME: test_NAF_8_7_0_Upload_Video_With_Unpublished_Status

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can view all videos uploaded to the CMS platform.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Verify all video columns are displayed correctly
5. Verify videos list is accessible
NAME: test_NAF_8_2_0_View_All_Videos_Uploaded

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 201: Verify the "Mark as read" button functionality.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Mark the first notification as read
5. Verify notification status changes
NAME: test_CMS_201_Mark_First_Notification_As_Read

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-37, NAF-39
    As a registered user I can view and update my bio
    Scenario: Update Bio
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Enter bio content
    5. Click on "Save" button
    6. Verify bio content is updated
    
    Expected Result: Bio content is updated
NAME: test_NAF_3_2_0_update_bio

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-433
    As a user, I want to be able to log out from the app
    Scenario: Logout and Relogin
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Log out" button
    4. Verify successful logout
    5. Click on "Log in" button
    6. Verify successful login
    
    Expected Result: User should be successfully logged in and redirected to the main app
NAME: test_logout_and_relogin

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can select a video and update its details.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Select the uploaded video
6. Update video details
7. Verify changes are saved successfully
NAME: test_NAF_8_8_0_Update_Video_Details

DESCRIPTION:
Test that a user with admin role can access the profile page and edit profile information.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Click the profile button
7. Verify that the user is on the profile page
8. Click the edit profile button
9. Enter the new profile information
10. Click the save button
11. Verify that the profile information is updated
NAME: test_NAF_7_4_0_Edit_Profile

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-15
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Non-existent Email
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter non-existent email: test@example.com
    5. Enter password: testpassword
    6. Click "Log in" button
    7. Verify error message appears
    
    Expected Result: Error message "There is no account associated with this email. Please sign up." should be displayed
NAME: test_NAF_2_2_0_login_with_wrong_email

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can navigate to the Video section of the CMS platform through the sidebar menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section via sidebar menu
4. Verify successful navigation to video section
NAME: test_NAF_8_1_0_Navigate_To_Video_Section

DESCRIPTION:
Test that a user with admin role has access to the whole list of mobile users, 
where admins are identified by "admin" role.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Edit user role
7. Verify that the user role is updated
NAME: test_NAF_7_6_0_Edit_User_Role

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can navigate to the program section of the app through the side menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section via side menu
4. Verify successful navigation to programs section
NAME: test_NAF_9_1_0_Navigate_To_Programs_Section

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can delete program using the 3 dots menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Delete the program using 3 dots menu
6. Verify program is successfully deleted
NAME: test_NAF_960_Delete_Program

DESCRIPTION:
Test that a user with admin role can successfully log out from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Click the logout button
7. Verify that the user is logged out
NAME: test_NAF_7_3_0_Logout_of_AdminPanel

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 204: Verify the "Mark as unread" functionality after marking as read.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Switch to Read tab
5. Mark the first read notification as unread
6. Verify notification has been marked as unread
NAME: test_CMS_204_Mark_Notification_As_Unread

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-91
    As a user during onboarding, I should be able to start one of the recommended programs right from the onboarding
    Scenario: Valid program selection and start
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Click on first recommended program
    3. Verify 'Start Program' button is displayed
    4. Click on 'Start Program' button
    5. Finish first day of the program
NAME: test_NAF_4_2_0_valid_program_selection_and_start

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can upload a video thumbnail.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Upload/Change thumbnail for the video
6. Verify thumbnail is successfully uploaded
NAME: test_NAF_8_12_0_Upload_Thumbnail

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can create and edit programs.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Wait for page to load after program creation
6. Edit the created program
7. Verify changes are saved successfully
NAME: test_NAF_980_Edit_Program

3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Search for the created program by title
6. Verify search results display the correct program

Test that an admin user can view all programs list.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Verify programs list is displayed
5. Verify all programs are accessible

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case: NAF-265
    As a user, I want to join a community based on my selected stage during onboarding.
    Scenario: Verify community feed navigation
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Verify community feed is displayed
    4. Verify community feed navigation is working
NAME: test_NAF_14_1_0_verify_community_feed_navigation

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can publish a video and verify it remains published after logout/login.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Publish the video
6. Logout and login again
7. Verify video is still published
NAME: test_NAF_8_9_0_Publish_Video

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can search videos by video title.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Search for the uploaded video by title
6. Verify search results display the correct video
NAME: test_NAF_8_3_0_Search_Videos

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 203: Verify that there is at least one unread notification.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Verify notification columns are visible
7. Verify all required columns are present
NAME: test_CMS_203_Verify_Unread_Notifications_Exist

DESCRIPTION:
Test that an admin user can delete a video using the 3 dots menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Delete the video using 3 dots menu
6. Verify video is successfully deleted
NAME: test_NAF_8_10_0_Delete_Video

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 202: Verify the switching between "Unread" and "Read" tabs.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Switch to Read tab
5. Switch to Unread tab
6. Verify tab switching works correctly
NAME: test_CMS_202_Switch_Between_Tabs

DESCRIPTION:
Test Case 199: Verify the notifications page loads correctly.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Verify tabs are displayed correctly

6. Verify notification rows are loaded
